name: Bubble Escape (2747Games)
description:
A level-based puzzle game where you play as a bubble trying to go deeper into a dungeon while avoiding traps and trying not to pop. 

This is an early prototype build with 20 levels. We need testing and feedback as much as possible, and we sincerely hope you find it worth your time. If you do please leave feedback and suggestions.

Positive and negative feedbacks are appreciated and desired. 

If you are interested to find out more about us and our future projects please follow us on our social media.

https://www.facebook.com/gaming/2747Games

https://twitter.com/2747Games
